description: This is the __init__.py file in the auth package, which provides authentication utilities for the multitenant time tracker project, including JWT token handling and password hashing.
external_files: bcrypt or passlib for password hashing
os or environment variable files for configuration

methods.name: jwt_token_handler
methods.description: Generates or decodes JWT tokens for authentication.

methods.name: password_hasher
methods.description: Hashes passwords and verifies hashed passwords.

methods.name: authenticate_user
methods.description: Authenticates user credentials and provides authentication response.
